testsuite.name: Validate actions (these are functions that dispatch actions)

testcase.name: Validate actions (these are functions that dispatch actions) resource should be a resource (i.e., mock a request)
testcase.classname: resource should be a resource (i.e., mock a request)

testcase.name: Validate actions (these are functions that dispatch actions) resource should give me the http error
testcase.classname: resource should give me the http error

testcase.name: Validate actions (these are functions that dispatch actions) resource should be POSTable
testcase.classname: resource should be POSTable

testcase.name: Validate actions (these are functions that dispatch actions) should update error message that displaying error mesage to user
testcase.classname: should update error message that displaying error mesage to user

testcase.classname: should update success message that displaying success message to user

testcase.name: Validate actions (these are functions that dispatch actions) should navigate (to profile, main, or landing)
testcase.classname: should navigate (to profile, main, or landing)

testcase.classname: should fetch articles (mocked request)

testcase.name: Validate Article actions should update the search keyword
testcase.classname: should update the search keyword

testcase.classname: should render articles

testcase.classname: should dispatch actions to create a new article

testcase.classname: should login with the given netid and password successfully

testcase.classname: should show error when the user and password is not right

testcase.classname: should log out successfully

testcase.classname: should fetch the user proile information

testcase.classname: should initialize state

testcase.classname: should state success (for displaying success message to user)

testcase.classname: should state error (for displaying error message to user)

testcase.classname: should set the articles
